title: Hero MotoCorp raises prices of Harley Davidson X440 model
description: Hero MotoCorp has announced that it will release Harley-Davidson X440 at Rs 2,39,500 (Ex-showroom, Delhi), reflecting a price increase of Rs 10,500 across all variants. However, customers can still avail a reduced introductory price of Rs 2,29,000 until 3rd August 2023. The booking process is available on the official website and interested customers can secure their own Harley-Davidson X440 with a nominal amount of Rs 5000/-.
